ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I became much more adept at analyzing literary techniques and combining historical information with the text to understand it better. I am much more comfortable reading and interpreting poetry. I also know much more know of Heian Period literature and how it fits into the broader context of the Japanese canon.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The class has great flexibility, allowing students to explore their interests, but there is also excellent direction and structure to the course. I feel like I could retake this course every semester and still be learning and enjoying it by the end. I think taking time out to explore Yale resources on the Tale of Genji in the later years would be great.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: This class really is a great testament to the strength of Yales course offerings. I highly recommend the course to anyone who is curious or wants to delve deeply into a single work of literature. The Tale of Genji is one of the most significant works ever written, not just in the Japanese canon, but globally. I had a great time delving into discussions of the readings, covering every topic imaginable. Also, Professor James Scanlon-Canegata is fantastic and has so much knowledge about the topic. It was great to be able to create and discuss theories about the work throughout the year.

extras.title: EALL 203 01/EALL 503 01/HUMS 284 01/LITR 198 01 - The Tale of Genji TR
